About

We Keep the Beats Thumping and your Legs Pumping

By Incorporating both weights and resistance, indoor cycling at Beat Cycle provides a FULL BODY WORKOUT that challenges riders through both cardiovascular and strength training.  The magic of indoor cycling is that you can target EVERYTHING, all at once.  Plus, unlike running, indoor cycling is a NO IMPACT workout, so your knees, hips, back and shoulders don’t get pounded, just strengthened.  

 

How nice is that?

We’re All About It.

We’ll spend 45 minutes on a Schwinn Carbonblue bike, the latest in indoor cycling technology, and push ourselves to the limit – hearts pumping, legs spinning, with incredible beats guiding the way. Yes, you’ll be working hard. And torching calories. But you probably won’t notice because you’ll be having too much FUN! You’ll be surrounded by 40 other fitness-minded people, pushing along with you, lending you their energy and feeding off of yours. They’ll make you want to work harder.  They’ll make you want to be stronger.  They’ll make you want to do better.  And you will.  That’s indoor cycling.  And we love it.  Come ride with us.

Our Studio

  • Opening September 2014
  • Opening September 2014

Our Bikes

We’re all about keeping it real.

 

We ride on cutting-edge Schwinn Carbon Blue bikes.  We found that the combination of their carbon-fiber reinforced construction and unique toothed belt gives the most real road feel while enabling a heart pumping full body workout.

Book a Bike

Our bikes fill up FAST. Booking for the next week opens at 10AM on Mondays. Cancellations can be accepted up to 24 hours in advance of a class.
